We must do all we can to protect Social Security and Medicare!

A recent report from the administration found that Social Security and Medicare funds face insolvency, and that 50-year-old's may not get full retirement benefits.

This should not be a partisan issue.

html: In a world of increasing instability, our enduring relationship with Israel has never been more vital. We cannot allow partisanship to infect and influence support for our allies.
text: In a world of increasing instability, our enduring relationship with Israel has never been more vital. We cannot allow partisanship to infect and influence support for our allies.

html: I am proud to support our ally and will always stand with Israel, America’s longtime friend and partner. Israel has received consistent, bipartisan support for foreign aid and closer cooperation between our two countries.
